query:
SELECT s.id, s.siteNumber, s.centreId, sc.name as centreName, 
       GROUP_CONCAT(uc.name) as approvedCategories
FROM sites s 
LEFT JOIN shopping_centres sc ON s.centreId = sc.id
LEFT JOIN site_usage_categories suc ON s.id = suc.siteId
LEFT JOIN usage_categories uc ON suc.categoryId = uc.id
WHERE s.siteNumber = '1'
GROUP BY s.id, s.siteNumber, s.centreId, sc.name
LIMIT 10;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 21ksxipa4kLneoE.root --database 6yeAhZnHexQXKcGnnUhDLE --execute SELECT s.id, s.siteNumber, s.centreId, sc.name as centreName, 
       GROUP_CONCAT(uc.name) as approvedCategories
FROM sites s 
LEFT JOIN shopping_centres sc ON s.centreId = sc.id
LEFT JOIN site_usage_categories suc ON s.id = suc.siteId
LEFT JOIN usage_categories uc ON suc.categoryId = uc.id
WHERE s.siteNumber = '1'
GROUP BY s.id, s.siteNumber, s.centreId, sc.name
LIMIT 10;
